Title: War and Peace
Author: Leo Tolstoy
Description: An epic that covers the events of the Napoleonic Wars and their impact on Russian society.

Author: George Orwell
Description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian society where the government controls all aspects of life.

Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Author: J.K. Rowling
Description: The adventures of a young wizard, Harry Potter, at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Author: Harper Lee
Description: A novel about racial prejudice and social justice in the southern United States.

Title: The Master and Margarita
Author: Mikhail Bulgakov
Description: A novel that intertwines stories of the devil, love, and life in the Soviet Union.

Title: Crime and Punishment
Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Description: A novel about moral dilemmas and the consequences of crime, exploring the nature of the human soul.
